plot: Legendary Z-film director Edward D. Wood, Jr., attempts to advance his own film career while resurrecting the fame of has-been horror star Bela Lugosi.
title: Ed and Bela
plot_es: Legendary Z-film director Edward D. Wood, Jr., attempts to advance his own film career while resurrecting the fame of has-been horror star Bela Lugosi.
plot_en: Legendary Z-film director Edward D. Wood, Jr., attempts to advance his own film career while resurrecting the fame of has-been horror star Bela Lugosi.
